items.name: Gamma Burst
items.desc: FL4K creates a Rift at a target location, teleporting their pet through the Rift and dealing Radiation Damage to nearby enemies.Additionally, FL4K’s pet becomes irradiated, growing in size and dealing bonus Radiation Damage when it attacks.Using Gamma Burst while FL4K’s Pet is downed or dead will revive the pet at the targeted location with 30% of its health, but will double Action Skill Cooldown Time.

items.name: Guard Skag
items.desc: FL4K is joined by a loyal Skag companion, which will increase FL4K's Damage.Hold "F" to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Skag to vomit acid onto enemies.

items.name: Ferocity
items.desc: FL4K's Pet deals increased damage.

items.flavor: The eyes are the groin of the face.
items.name: Go for the Eyes!
items.desc: When FL4K’s pet attacks an enemy, the first melee attack is an automatic Critical Hit that deals increased damage.

items.name: Persistence Hunter
items.desc: Increases FL4K’s Gun Damage and Action Skill Duration.

items.name: Who Rescued Who?
items.desc: Whenever FL4K’s Pet deals damage, FL4K regenerates health for a few seconds. Whenever FL4K deals damage to an enemy, their Pet’s health is restored for a portion of the damage dealt.

stats.name: Converts $VALUE$ of Damage Dealt into Pet Health

items.name: He Bites!
items.desc: When FL4K's pet takes damage, the pet returns some of that damage to the attacker.

items.name: Frenzy
items.desc: Hunter Skill. When FL4K’s pet deals damage, FL4K and their pet gain a stack of Frenzy. Each stack of Frenzy increases Damage. The stacks decay after a few seconds.

items.flavor: What are they feeding that skag?
items.name: Atomic Aroma
items.desc: While Gamma Burst is active, FL4K’s pet is surrounded by a Radiation Aura, constantly damaging all nearby enemies.

items.name: Hive Mind
items.desc: When FL4K takes damage, a portion of all damage they take is shared to their pet instead.

items.name: Psycho Head on a Stick
items.desc: Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, their Pet gains increased Movement Speed and Damage for a few seconds.

stats.name: Psycho Head On A Stick Duration: $VALUE$ seconds

items.name: Empathic Rage
items.desc: For the duration of Gamma Burst, Damage dealt by FL4K is increased.

items.name: Great Horned Skag
items.desc: FL4K’s Skag evolves into a larger, Great Horned Skag which will increase FL4K’s Damage and Gun Damage.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Great Horned Skag will charge at enemies and knock them into the air.

items.name: Mutated Defenses
items.desc: When FL4K’s pet is at low health, it gains Damage Reduction and regenerates health. This skill has a long cooldown.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: $VALUE$ of Max Pet Health

items.name: Barbaric Yawp
items.desc: Increases the power of Pet Bonuses granted to FL4K.

items.name: Eridian Skag
items.desc: FL4K’s Skag evolves into an Eridian Skag, which will increase FL4K’s Damage and Fire Rate.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, their Eridian Skag pulls nearby enemies in by generating a Singularity.

items.name: Endurance
items.desc: When FL4K or FL4K’s Pet kills an enemy while Gamma Burst is active, the duration of Gamma Burst is extended and pet damage is increased. These effects can stack up to 5 times.

items.name: Shared Spirit
items.desc: While FL4K is at low health, a portion of all damage they take is shared to their pet instead.

items.name: Pack Tactics
items.desc: All Damage dealt by FL4K and their Pet is increased. Additionally, the Maximum Health of both FL4K and their Pet is increased.

items.name: Burst Aid
items.desc: After using Gamma Burst, the Rift remains for the duration of the skill. While standing near the Rift, FL4K and their allies rapidly Regenerate Health.

items.name: Dominance
items.desc: Melee Override Skill. FL4K establishes dominance over an enemy, turning it into an ally for a short time. If the enemy is a Beast, the duration is doubled. While under the effects of Dominance, the target constantly loses health until it dies or the effect ends. Only one enemy can be dominated at a time. An enemy can only be dominated once.

items.flavor: In your mind, you can fly.
items.name: Rakk Attack!
items.desc: FL4K sends forward 2 Rakk to dive-bomb enemies.This skill has multiple charges.

items.name: Spiderant Centurion
items.desc: FL4K is joined by a loyal Spiderant companion, which will cause FL4K to constantly regenerate health.Hold "F" to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Spiderant to charge into enemies.

items.name: Interplanetary Stalker
items.desc: Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, they gain a stack of Interplanetary Stalker. For each stack of Interplanetary Stalker, they gain a bonus to all damage dealt. Additionally, they gain a unique stacking bonus depending on the type of enemy killed. Each unique bonus can stack up to 3 times. Each stack decays after a short time.

items.name: Leave No Trace
items.desc: When FL4K scores a Critical Hit, there is a chance for 1 ammo to be added to their magazine.

items.name: Second Intention
items.desc: Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, they gain increased Reload Speed. This bonus is increased if FL4K scores a Critical Kill.

items.name: Hunter's Eye
items.desc: FL4K gains bonuses when fighting different types of enemies.

items.name: Ambush Predator
items.desc: While there are no enemies nearby, FL4K’s Weapon Handling and Critical Hit Damage are increased.

items.name: Head Count
items.desc: Whenever FL4K scores a Critical Hit, there is a chance their Action Skill Cooldown is reduced.

items.flavor: Freeze them in their tracks.
items.name: Rakk Open a Cold One
items.desc: Converts FL4K’s Rakk to Cryo damage.

items.name: Two F4ng
items.desc: FL4K has a chance to fire an extra projectile per shot.

items.name: Falconer’s Feast
items.desc: When FL4K’s Rakk damage an enemy, a portion of FL4K’s health is restored.

items.name: Spiderant Scorcher
items.desc: FL4K's Spiderant evolves into a Scorcher, occasionally dealing Incendiary Damage to all enemies nearby. While accompanied by the Scorcher, FL4K constantly regenerates health and gains Elemental Resistance.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Scorcher will charge enemies.

items.name: Big Game
items.desc: FL4K’s Hunter Skills become much more effective and have a longer duration.

items.name: The Most Dangerous Game
items.desc: Hunter Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills a Badass or stronger enemy, they gain increased Critical Hit Damage, Gun Damage, and Handling for a long time.Additionally, they receive a cash reward from the Intergalactic Bureau of Bounty Hunting.

items.name: Spiderant Countess
items.desc: FL4K’s Spiderant evolves into a Countess, which will cause FL4K to constantly regenerate health and gain Damage Reduction.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Countess will burrow underground and then emerge dealing Corrosive Damage in an area.

items.name: Flock 'N Load
items.desc: FL4K sends forward additional Rakk.

items.name: Grim Harvest
items.desc: FL4K gains increased Gun Damage and Action Skill Damage.

items.name: Galactic Shadow
items.desc: FL4K deals increased Critical Hit Damage, and enemies are less likely to attack them.

items.name: Rakkcelerate
items.desc: FL4K’s Rakk have increased Cooldown Rate, and gain an Additional Charge.

items.name: Megavore
items.desc: FL4K gains a chance to score a Critical Hit with weapons against any part of enemies.

items.name: Fade Away
items.desc: FL4K cloaks, turning invisible. FL4K can fire 3 shots while cloaked, and each shot is automatically a Critical Hit.While cloaked, FL4K has increased Movement Speed and Health Regeneration.

items.name: Jabber Sidekick
items.desc: FL4K is joined by a loyal Jabber companion, armed with a Pistol. While accompanied by the Jabber, FL4K’s Movement Speed is increased.Hold "F" to issue an Attack Command, which will cause the Jabber to throw a Radiation Barrel at enemies.

items.name: Self-Repairing System
items.desc: FL4K’s Maximum Health is increased, and they constantly regenerate health.

items.name: Sic 'Em
items.desc: Attack Command has lowered Cooldown and increased Damage.

items.name: Furious Attack
items.desc: Hunter Skill. After shooting an enemy, FL4K gains a stack of Furious Attack. For each stack of Furious Attack, FL4K’s Handling and Gun Damage are increased. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

items.name: Eager to Impress
items.desc: Kill Skill. Whenever FL4K kills an enemy, Action Skill Cooldown Time is reduced.Whenever FL4K's pet kills an enemy, Action Skill Cooldown Time is reduced even more and Attack Command's cooldown is refreshed.

items.name: All My BFF's
items.desc: Allies share a portion of FL4K’s total Health Regeneration. FL4K’s pet shares twice the amount of Health Regeneration.

stats.name: Allies Share $VALUE$ of FL4K's Health Regeneration

items.name: Overclocked
items.desc: FL4K gains increased Fire Rate. FL4K gains even more Fire Rate after reloading.

items.name: Guerrillas in the Mist
items.desc: Fade Away no longer ends after FL4K attacks, at the cost of Critical Hit Damage and Fade Away duration being reduced.

items.flavor: Play dead.
items.name: Lick the Wounds
items.desc: When FL4K is in Fight For Your Life, their pet will attempt to revive them.

items.name: Turn Tail and Run
items.desc: While moving, FL4K constantly regenerates health and gains Damage Reduction.While still, FL4K gains Gun Damage and Fire Rate.

stats.name: Health Regeneration While Moving: $VALUE$ of Max Health/sec

items.name: Beefcake Jabber
items.desc: FL4K’s Jabber evolves into a Beefcake, discarding its pistol and equipping a Shotgun. While accompanied by the Beefcake, FL4K gains increased Movement Speed and Maximum Health.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Beefcake will summon a melee weapon to deliver a powerful attack that knocks enemies back.

items.flavor: Not my Monkeys.
items.name: Not My Circus
items.desc: After Fade Away ends, FL4K’s pet will Taunt, drawing the attention of all enemies in a huge radius.For a few seconds after Taunting, the pet gains powerful Damage Reduction.

items.name: Hidden Machine
items.desc: When an enemy has no target or is attacking a different target, FL4K deals increased damage against them.

items.name: The Fast and the Furryous
items.desc: While above half health, FL4K's Gun Damage and Movement Speed are increased.

items.name: Gunslinger Jabber
items.desc: FL4K’s Jabber upgrades his gear and equips an SMG. While accompanied by the Gunslinger, FL4K gains increased Movement Speed and Critical Hit Damage.When FL4K issues an Attack Command, the Gunslinger equips a Rocket Launcher to attack the target.

items.name: Until You Are Dead
items.desc: The Health Regeneration and Movement Speed of Fade Away persists for a short time after the skill has ended.

items.name: Rage and Recover
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, FL4K and FL4K’s pet regenerate health for a few seconds.

items.name: Unblinking Eye
items.desc: Successive hits on the same target increase FL4K's Critical Damage per hit. Unblinking Eye resets every 3 hits.

items.name: The Power Inside
items.desc: FL4K and FL4K’s Pet gain increased Damage when FL4K activates an Action Skill.If FL4K is at full health, the increased Damage is doubled.

items.name: Phasecast
items.desc: Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path.

items.name: Do Harm
items.desc: Killing an enemy grants Amara a stack of Rush. Activating her Action Skill consumes all Rush stacks.For every stack of Rush consumed, Amara's Action Skill Damage is temporarily increased.

stats.name: Action Skill Damage: $VALUE$ per stack consumed

items.name: Fast Hand(s)
items.desc: Amara's Reload Speed, Weapon Swap Speed, and Mode Switch Speed are improved.

items.name: Violent Tapestry
items.desc: Applying a Status Effect grants Amara a stack of Rush. Activating her action skill consumes all Rush stacks.For every stack of Rush consumed, Amara's Status Effect Chance is temporarily increased.

items.name: Alacrity
items.desc: Amara gains increased Reload Speed for every stack of Rush. After consuming Rush stacks, this bonus is increased for a few seconds.

stats.name: Reload Speed: $VALUE$ after action skill use

items.name: Transcend
items.desc: Amara gains increased Accuracy and Critical Hit Damage for a few seconds after activating her Action Skill.

items.name: Restless
items.desc: Amara gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate.

items.name: Soul Sap
items.desc: A portion of all damage dealt by Amara's Action Skill is returned to her or a nearby ally as health.

stats.name: Life Steal: $VALUE$ of Skill damage dealt

items.name: Ascendant
items.desc: All Action Skill Augments gain increased effects.

stats.name: Stillness of Mind: Breaks $VALUE$ seconds after being damaged

items.name: Deliverance
items.desc: Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path.Whenever Amara’s Astral Projection damages an enemy or object, it releases homing Elemental Projectiles that trigger her Action Skill Elemental Effect on enemies.

items.name: Stillness of Mind
items.desc: Enemies damaged by Amara's Action Skill become phaselocked until they are damaged or the duration ends. However, Action Skill Cooldown is increased.If Amara targets an enemy with Phasegrasp, enemies near the Grasped target are phaselocked.

items.name: From Rest
items.desc: Amara gains improved Fire Rate and Charge Time.

items.name: Laid Bare
items.desc: Enemies take increased damage from all sources for a few seconds after being damaged by Amara's Action Skill.

items.name: Wrath
items.desc: Amara gains increased Gun Damage. This effect is increased after she activates her action skill for a few seconds.

stats.name: Gun Damage: $VALUE$ after action skill use

items.name: Reverberation
items.desc: Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself, dealing damage to everything in its path.Astral Projection deals increased damage for every enemy it hits.

items.name: Remnant
items.desc: When Amara kills an enemy with a Gun or Action Skill, she creates a homing projectile that seeks out a new enemy dealing her Action Skill Elemental Damage.Any Overkill Damage is added to the projectile's damage.

items.name: Awakening
items.desc: Amara's Rush stacks gain increased effectiveness.

items.name: Tandava
items.desc: Amara sends forward an Astral Projection of herself. When it hits a target, it explodes, damaging all nearby enemies.

items.flavor: Taking risks gives me energy.
items.name: Avatar
items.desc: Amara's Action Skill can be activated while it's cooling down. This skill may only be used once per completed cooldown.Additionally, increases Amara's Max Rush Stacks.Additionally, if Amara's Action Skill kills an enemy, it refunds half of her Rush stacks.

items.name: Phasegrasp
items.desc: Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds. Some enemies are immune to being Grasped and instantly take damage instead.

items.name: Anima
items.desc: Amara's Status Effects deal increased damage over time and have increased duration. Her Action Skill Status Effect deals further increased damage.

items.name: Steady Hand(s)
items.desc: Amara gains increased Weapon Handling and Accuracy.

items.name: Infusion
items.desc: Convert a portion of damage dealt by Amara's weapons into her Action Skill Element.

items.name: Tempest
items.desc: Amara deals increased Elemental Damage. Shock damage is further increased.

items.name: Illuminated Fist
items.desc: Amara gains increased Melee Damage and her Melee Damage is converted to her Action Skill Element.

items.name: Wildfire
items.desc: Whenever Amara applies a Status Effect to an enemy, it has a chance to spread to a nearby enemy.

items.flavor: Fire wants to be free.
items.name: Soulfire
items.desc: Converts Amara's Action Skill to Incendiary Damage.

items.name: Dread
items.desc: Amara's Gun Damage is increased for a few seconds after an enemy is Grasped.Whenever any player kills a Grasped enemy, their current weapon is instantly reloaded.

items.name: The Eternal Fist
items.desc: Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds.Whenever the Grasped enemy is killed, a new fist seeks out and Grasps a new target.

items.flavor: Don't everybody get up at once.
items.name: Allure
items.desc: Amara’s Action Skill creates a singularity that pulls in enemies.

items.name: Indiscriminate
items.desc: Amara's bullets that damage enemies have a chance to ricochet and deal decreased damage to other nearby enemies. Ricochet Chance and Damage are increased if the target is currently affected by Phasegrasp or Stillness of Mind.

items.name: Catharsis
items.desc: Whenever Amara triggers an elemental effect on an enemy, when that enemy dies that enemy explodes, dealing her attuned element damage along with any other element that is currently inflicted upon that enemy. This skill has a short cooldown.

items.name: Deep Well
items.desc: Amara gains increased Magazine Size with elemental weapons.

items.name: Ties that Bind
items.desc: Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds.Enemies near the Grasped target are linked, and any damage dealt to a linked target is shared between all other linked targets.

items.name: Sustainment
items.desc: Amara gains Life Steal whenever she deals Elemental Damage with her weapon.

items.name: Conflux
items.desc: Whenever Amara applies a Status Effect to an enemy, she gains a chance to randomly Electrocute, Ignite, or Melt that enemy.

items.name: Fist Over Matter
items.desc: Amara summons a giant fist that bursts from the ground and locks the targeted enemy in place for a few seconds.After Grasping the targeted enemy, large fists appear and constantly smash the area, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

items.flavor: A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle.
items.name: Forceful Expression
items.desc: Amara's guns deal Bonus Elemental Damage, based on her Action Skill Element.

stats.name: Bonus Elemental Damage: $VALUE$ of Damage Dealt

items.name: Phaseslam
items.desc: Amara leaps into the air and Slams the ground, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and knocking them up.

items.name: Root to Rise
items.desc: Amara gains increased Max Health.

items.name: Personal Space
items.desc: Amara's weapon shots deal Bonus Damage based on the distance to her target. The closer the target, the greater the bonus.

stats.name: Bonus Damage: up to $VALUE$ of damage dealt

items.name: Clarity
items.desc: Amara constantly regenerates health. The lower her health, the more powerful the regeneration.After using an Action Skill, this bonus is doubled for a few seconds.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: up to $VALUE$ Missing Health / sec

items.name: Arms Deal
items.desc: Amara deals increased Splash Damage, and takes reduced Splash Damage.

items.name: Samsara
items.desc: Whenever Amara deals damage to an enemy with her Action Skill, she adds a stack of Samsara. For every stack of Samsara, Amara gains increased Gun Damage and Health Regeneration for a few seconds. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: $VALUE$ of Max Health / sec. per stack

items.name: Helping Hand(s)
items.desc: For a few seconds after using her Action Skill, Amara's arms remain active and grant her Damage Reduction.

items.flavor: Get your mind into the gutter.
items.name: Blight Tiger
items.desc: Converts Amara's Action Skill to Corrosive Damage.

items.name: Mindfulness
items.desc: Whenever Amara takes damage, she gains a stack of Mindfulness. For every stack of Mindfulness, Amara gains improved Shield Regeneration Delay and Movement Speed. Stacks decay after a few seconds.

items.name: Find Your Center
items.desc: Amara gains increased Melee Damage.Additionally, for a few seconds after using her Action Skill, Amara gains increased Melee Range.

items.name: Vigor
items.desc: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy with Amara's Action Skill grants all allies increased Movement Speed for a few seconds.

items.name: Fracture
items.desc: Amara summons a line of fists that erupt from the ground, dealing damage to enemies in front of Amara.

items.flavor: Few people laughed, few people cried, most people were silent.
items.name: Revelation
items.desc: Amara’s Action Skill now creates a Nova when it damages enemies, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

items.name: One With Nature
items.desc: Amara gains increased Max Health and Elemental Damage Resistance to her Action Skill Element.

items.name: Downfall
items.desc: Amara leaps into the air and shoots an Elemental Beam below her briefly, followed by a Slam.

items.name: Do unto Others
items.desc: Whenever an enemy damages Amara, she automatically throws an energy orb back at them, dealing Action Skill Elemental Damage. This skill has a short cooldown.

items.name: Jab Cross
items.desc: Whenever Amara deals melee damage to an enemy, she gains increased Action Skill Damage and increased Gun Damage for a few seconds.

items.name: Guardian Angel
items.desc: When Amara enters Fight For Your Life, she immediately gains a Second Wind, restores her health, and creates an Action Skill Elemental Nova that may knock back nearby enemies. This skill has a long cooldown.

stats.name: Max Health Restored: $VALUE$ of Max Health

items.name: Glamour
items.desc: Enemies damaged by Amara's action skill become confused and temporarily attack their allies. However, Action Skill Cooldown is increased.If Amara targets an enemy with Phasegrasp, enemies near the Grasped target are confused as well.

items.name: Blitz
items.desc: Melee Override. Press "V" while aiming at an enemy to make Amara dash a short distance forward and perform a special melee strike, dealing Elemental Melee Damage.If a Blitz melee attack kills an enemy, Blitz’s cooldown is immediately reset.

items.name: Shockra
items.desc: Converts your Action Skill to Shock Damage.

items.name: SNTNL
items.desc: Send into battle an automated SNTNL drone that continually flies through the environment and attacks enemies with its Machine Guns.Pressing "F" or "G" while SNTNL is active causes it to attack the enemy under Zane's crosshairs, if any.

items.name: Violent Speed
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains increased Movement Speed for a few seconds.

items.name: Cold Bore
items.desc: Zane gains increased Weapon Swap Speed. The next shot fired after swapping weapons deals Bonus Cryo Damage.

items.name: Violent Momentum
items.desc: Zane's Gun Damage is increased while moving. The quicker he moves, the greater the Gun Damage bonus.

stats.name: Gun Damage: $VALUE$ at default walk speed

items.name: Cool Hand
items.desc: Zane gains increased Reload Speed.Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane's Reload Speed is increased for a few seconds.

items.name: Drone Delivery
items.desc: SNTNL will occasionally drop a free grenade based on Zane's current grenade mod while attacking enemies.

items.name: Salvation
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane's weapons gain Life Steal for a few seconds.

items.flavor: Chillin', killin', you know.
items.name: Winter's Drone
items.desc: Converts SNTNL's primary weapons to Cryo Damage.

items.flavor: No half-measures.
items.name: Death Follows Close
items.desc: All of Zane's Kill Skills gain increased effect and duration.

items.name: Static Field
items.desc: SNTNL emits a static field that sends a Shock Beam to nearby enemies, draining their shields and replenishing Zane’s.

items.name: Bad Dose
items.desc: SNTNL occasionally shoots out a beam of Radiation that weakens enemies and buffs Zane.For every weakened enemy, Zane’s Movement Speed and Fire Rate are increased.Weakened enemies have decreased Movement Speed and Attack Speed.

items.name: Violent Violence
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains increased Fire Rate for a few seconds.

items.name: Playing Dirty
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane’s next five shots all have a chance to fire an additional projectile.

items.flavor: Coordinates zero-nine-two-six-four-seven-one-two.
items.name: Almighty Ordnance
items.desc: Hold down "F" or "G" while SNTNL is deployed to paint a target area.SNTNL fires a missile barrage at that area, and if an enemy is killed, SNTNL's duration is reset.This can only be used once per Action Skill use.

items.name: Boomsday
items.desc: SNTNL adds a rocket pod to its primary weapons, allowing it to shoot rockets as well as machine guns.

items.name: Good Misfortune
items.desc: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy increases Zane's Action Skill Duration. This skill has diminishing returns.

stats.name: Duration Return: up to $VALUE$ max duration

items.name: Seein' Red
items.desc: Activating an Action Skill automatically activates all of Zane's Kill Skills.

items.name: Digi-Clone
items.desc: Spawn a Digi-Clone of Zane. This Clone stays in place, but distracts and fires at enemies.Pressing "F" or "G" while the Clone is active causes Zane and the Clone to swap places.

items.name: Synchronicity
items.desc: Whenever one or more of Zane's action skills are active, he gains increased Gun Damage for each active action skill.

stats.name: Gun Damage: $VALUE$ per active action skill

items.name: Praemunitus
items.desc: Zane and his Digi-Clone gain increased Magazine Size.

items.name: Borrowed Time
items.desc: Zane gains increased Action Skill Duration for every active Action Skill.

stats.name: Action Skill Duration: $VALUE$ per active action skill

items.name: Donnybrook
items.desc: Kill Skill. Whenever Zane kills an enemy, he and his Digi-Clone receive increased Gun Damage and gain Health Regeneration for a few seconds.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: $VALUE$ of Missing Health / sec

items.name: Fractal Frags
items.desc: The Digi-Clone throws a copy of Zane's current grenade mod when it is first activated. If the Digi-Clone is killed, it drops a free grenade.Kill Skill. Killing an enemy while the Digi-Clone is active gives the Clone a chance to throw a grenade.

items.name: Duct Tape Mod
items.desc: The first shot fired from Zane's gun has a chance to also fire a grenade. This skill has a short cooldown

items.name: Binary System
items.desc: Whenever Zane swaps places with his Clone, a Cryo Nova is triggered around Zane and his Clone.

items.flavor: I can do this all day.
items.name: Quick Breather
items.desc: Whenever Zane swaps places with his Clone, his shield immediately begins recharging.

items.name: Schadenfreude
items.desc: Whenever the Clone takes damage, Zane's shield is restored by a portion of that damage.

items.name: Which One's Real?
items.desc: Enemies are more likely to target the Clone for a few seconds after it’s summoned and after swapping places.

items.name: Pocket Full of Grenades
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Zane gains Grenade Regeneration for a few seconds.

items.flavor: The greatest trick the Devil ever pulled was convincing the world he was actually a hologram.
items.name: Old-U
items.desc: Press "F" or "G" during Fight for Your Life if Digi-Clone is active to destroy the clone and immediately gain a Second Wind with full health.

stats.name: Max Health Restored: $VALUE$ of Max Health

items.name: Supersonic Man
items.desc: Whenever one or more of Zane's Action Skills are active, he gains increased Movement Speed for each active Action Skill.

stats.name: Movement Speed: $VALUE$ per active action skill

items.name: Doppelbanger
items.desc: Hold down "F" or "G" to end the action skill early.When Zane’s Action Skill is ended, the Clone explodes, dealing Splash Damage to all nearby enemies.The more Action Skill time remaining, the greater the damage.

items.name: Digital Distribution
items.desc: If Zane takes health damage while the Clone is active, a portion of that damage is shared to his Clone instead.

items.name: Like a Ghost
items.desc: Zane and his Digi-Clone gain a chance to ignore bullets. This chance is increased for a few seconds after activating an Action Skill. This effect stacks.

items.name: Boom. Enhance.
items.desc: Whenever Zane summons his Digi-Clone, it consumes up to 3 grenades. For every grenade consumed, the Digi-Clone gains increased Gun Damage, Max Health, Fire Rate, Reload Speed, and Digi-Clone Duration.

items.name: Trick of the Light
items.desc: Zane deals Bonus Shock Damage to enemies that aren't targeting him.

items.name: Double Barrel
items.desc: The Clone is equipped with a copy of Zane's Current Weapon when activated.Swapping places with the Clone causes Zane and his clone to gain increased Gun Damage.

items.name: Barrier
items.desc: Drop a deployable Barrier that blocks incoming projectiles. Zane and his allies can shoot through the Barrier, dealing increased Gun Damage.Pressing "F" or "G" while Barrier is active picks up and holds the Barrier, but the size and bonuses are decreased.

items.name: Adrenaline
items.desc: Zane gains increased Action Skill Cooldown Rate. This bonus is based on the amount of shields he has. The more percent full, the greater the bonus.

stats.name: Action Skill Cooldown Rate: Up to $VALUE$

items.name: Hearty Stock
items.desc: Zane gains increased Maximum Shield Capacity.

items.name: Ready for Action
items.desc: Zane gains improved Shield Recharge Rate and Shield Recharge Delay.

items.name: Brain Freeze
items.desc: Whenever Zane scores a Critical Hit on an enemy, there's a chance they will be Slowed. This effect stacks until the target is Frozen.

items.name: Stiff Upper Lip
items.desc: Whenever Zane is damaged, he gains Damage Resistance against that damage type.

items.name: Rise to the Occasion
items.desc: Zane gains Health Regeneration. The lower his shield is, the higher the bonus.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: up to $VALUE$ of Max Health / sec

items.name: Charged Relay
items.desc: Whenever Zane or an ally touches the Barrier, they gain increased Movement Speed and Reload Speed for a few seconds.

stats.name: Duration: $VALUE$ seconds after moving away from Barrier

items.name: Confident Competence
items.desc: While Zane's shields are active, he gains increased Gun Damage and Accuracy. This bonus is based on the amount of shields he has. The more percent full, the greater the bonus.

items.flavor: One: personal space.Two: personal space.Three: stay out of my personal space...
items.name: All-rounder
items.desc: Zane's Barrier becomes a dome, covering all sides.

items.name: Nanites or Some Shite
items.desc: Zane and his allies gain Health Regeneration, increased Reload Speed, and greatly improved Shield Recharge Delay while near his Barrier.The lower his health, the more health is regenerated.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: up to $VALUE$ of Max Health/sec while near Barrier

items.name: Really Expensive Jacket
items.desc: Elemental Status Effects applied to Zane have reduced duration.

items.name: Best Served Cold
items.desc: Kill Skill. Whenever Zane kills an enemy, they create a Cryo Nova, dealing damage to all nearby enemies. This skill has a short cooldown.

items.name: Futility Belt
items.desc: Zane gains resistance to non-elemental damage.Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, all elemental damage Zane takes is converted to non-elemental damage.

items.name: Retaliation
items.desc: Zane and allies near the Barrier gain increased Gun Damage for a few seconds after the Barrier takes damage.

items.name: Deterrence Field
items.desc: Enemies that touch the Barrier take Shock Damage and are staggered.

items.name: Refreshment
items.desc: Whenever Zane damages a frozen enemy with his weapon, he gains some of that damage back as health.

items.name: Calm, Cool, Collected
items.desc: Whenever Zane Freezes an enemy, his shield instantly begins recharging.If Zane's shields are already full, he regenerates health for a few seconds.If Zane's health is already full, his Action Skill Cooldowns and Durations are immediately reset.

stats.name: Health Regeneration: up to $VALUE$ max health / sec

items.name: Nerves of Steel
items.desc: Zane gains increasing Accuracy and Handling. The longer his shield is full, the greater the bonus.

items.flavor: Throw that on the big screen.
items.name: Distributed Denial
items.desc: Zane's Barrier gains the effects of his currently equipped Shield Mod. Additionally, shield effects are applied to all allies near the Barrier. Bonuses to Zane are reduced.

items.flavor: For when the V-34 just isn't enough.
items.name: V-35 Grenade Launcher
items.desc: The V-35 is a semi-automatic grenade launcher. Its grenades are not affected by Moze’s equipped grenade mod.

items.name: Grizzled
items.desc: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy reduces Moze’s remaining Action Skill Cooldown Time. This skill has diminishing returns.

items.name: Deadlines
items.desc: Firing Iron Bear Weapons drains less Fuel.Killing an enemy while Iron Bear is active increases Fuel. This skill has diminishing returns.

items.name: Fire in the Skag Den
items.desc: Whenever Moze deals Splash Damage, she deals bonus Incendiary Damage.

items.name: Means of Destruction
items.desc: Whenever Moze deals Splash Damage, there is a chance to add ammo to her currently equipped weapon’s magazine, with a smaller chance to return a grenade.

items.name: Torgue Cross-Promotion
items.desc: All Splash Damage dealt by Moze has a chance to double in size.

stats.name: $VALUE$ chance to double Splash Damage Radius

items.name: Stainless Steel Bear
items.desc: Iron Bear gains additional armor and increased Maximum Fuel.

items.flavor: To be frank, I'm just being Ernest.
items.name: Shaped Charge
items.desc: Direct hits with the V-35 deal increased damage.

items.flavor: If you want guidance, get a sherpa. If you want explosions, get a Vladof.
items.name: Vanquisher Rocket Pod
items.desc: The Vanquisher Rocket Pod is a rocket launcher capable of rapid-firing volleys of unguided explosive rockets.

items.name: Pull the Holy Pin
items.desc: Moze’s grenades have a chance to score a Critical Hit, dealing greatly increased damage. Sources of Critical Hit Damage do not affect grenade Critical Hits.

items.name: Auto Bear
items.desc: After Moze exits Iron Bear, it will remain deployed in place for a short time.While Auto Bear remains active, it will target and attack nearby enemies until its duration ends, then it will charge at an enemy and self-destruct.

items.name: Musical Chairs
items.desc: Occasionally, the V-35 fires a Singularity Grenade that pulls in nearby enemies before exploding.

items.name: Active Tracking
items.desc: The Vanquisher Rocket Pod now fires homing rockets and has increased Reload Speed. Hold down "F" and aim at enemies to designate up to 6 targets. Releasing Fire Button launches a volley of homing rockets at the designated targets.

items.name: Vampyr
items.desc: Whenever Moze damages an enemy with a thrown grenade, for every enemy hit, she restores a portion of her missing health.

stats.name: Restores $VALUE$ of missing health per enemy hit

items.name: Why Can't I Carry All These Grenades?
items.desc: Increases Moze’s grenade carrying capacity.

items.name: Lock and Speedload
items.desc: The V-35’s Reload Speed is greatly increased and it now fires a 5-round burst.

items.name: Target Softening
items.desc: The Vanquisher Rocket Pod deals greatly reduced damage per rocket, but fires in a 6-rocket spread. Additionally, enemies hit by Vanquisher Rocket Pod rockets take increased damage from all sources.

items.flavor: The greatest enemy is one with nothing to lose... and a grenade.
items.name: To the Last
items.desc: Moze gains the ability to throw grenades while in Fight For Your Life. If she threw a grenade before gaining Second Wind, a grenade is refunded.

items.name: Explosive Punctuation
items.desc: When Moze deals Splash Damage, her Action Skill Cooldown Rate is briefly increased.

items.name: Hammerdown Protocol
items.desc: Instead of a volley of conventional rockets, the Vanquisher Rocket Pod launches a single rocket with a nuclear warhead, dealing massive Radiation Damage.

items.name: Short Fuse
items.desc: Whenever Moze deals Gun Damage, there is a chance of a secondary explosion centered on the target.

stats.name: Secondary Explosion Damage: $VALUE$ of Gun Damage

items.flavor: It's like a bullet, only bigger. And faster. And wrapped in lightning.
items.name: Railgun
items.desc: The Railgun fires electrified high-velocity projectiles that deal Shock Damage.

items.name: Security Bear
items.desc: Iron Bear gains a bubble shield that reduces damage taken.The shield deactivates if it sustains too much damage, reactivating after a short cooldown.

stats.name: $VALUE$ Iron Bear Max Health added as Shields

items.name: Armored Infantry
items.desc: While Moze’s shields are active, she gains Damage Reduction and increased Gun Damage.

items.name: Selfless Vengeance
items.desc: Whenever Moze reloads, she loses a small portion of her health and grants additional Incendiary Damage to her and her allies’ rounds for a few seconds.

stats.name: Bonus Incendiary Damage: $VALUE$ of gun damage dealt

items.name: Drowning in Brass
items.desc: Kill Skill. Killing an enemy grants Moze a stack of Drowning in Brass.For each stack of Drowning in Brass, Moze’s Fire Rate is reduced, but Gun Damage is increased for both her and her allies.

items.name: Thin Red Line
items.desc: A portion of Moze’s health is Reserved and cannot be restored, but her Maximum Shield is increased by the same amount.

stats.name: $VALUE$ Max Health Reserved and Added to Max Shields

items.name: Vladof Ingenuity
items.desc: Moze’s Maximum Shield is increased, and she gains resistance to Shock Damage.

items.name: Hell on Rails
items.desc: Railgun now fires superheated rounds that deal Incendiary Damage, but have increased Fuel Drain per shot.

items.flavor: Vladof supports the right to bear armored bear arms.
items.name: Bear Fist
items.desc: The Bear Fist is a pneumatic-driven fist that deals massive damage to a single target at close range.

items.name: Full Can of Whoop-Ass
items.desc: Entering Iron Bear causes Moze’s and her allies’ shields to immediately begin recharging at an increased Shield Recharge Rate.

items.name: Experimental Munitions
items.desc: Whenever Moze scores a Critical Hit, she deals bonus Incendiary Damage.

stats.name: Bonus Incendiary Damage: $VALUE$ of Damage Dealt

items.name: Wild Swing
items.desc: Whenever Bear Fist hits an enemy, it deals random bonus Elemental Damage to that enemy and all enemies nearby.

items.name: Capacitive Armature
items.desc: When Railgun hits an enemy, it chains to nearby enemies, dealing reduced Shock Damage to more targets.

items.name: Behind the Iron Curtain
items.desc: Moze’s Shield Recharge Delay is reduced, and her Shield Recharge Rate is increased.

items.name: Desperate Measures
items.desc: Moze’s Gun Damage is increased depending on how low her health is. The lower her health, the greater the increase.

items.flavor: Step into my office.
items.name: Close the Distance
items.desc: Instead of punching, Bear Fist now launches its fist forward and grabs enemies at greatly increased range, dealing Shock Damage and pulling them back to Iron Bear.

items.name: Corrosive Sabot Round
items.desc: Railgun now fires a specialty round that deals reduced damage and explodes after a short delay.Railgun shots have reduced Fuel Drain and the Magazine Size is increased.

items.name: Phalanx Doctrine
items.desc: Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Moze gains a stack of Phalanx Doctrine. For every stack of Phalanx Doctrine, Moze’s Maximum Shield and Gun Damage are increased. Each stack lasts 30 seconds. There is no stack limit.

items.flavor: Just click on their heads.
items.name: Force Feedback
items.desc: Whenever Moze scores a Critical Kill, her shields immediately begin recharging.

items.name: Shockhammer
items.desc: Bear Fist is now capable of sustained rapid fire punching.Additionally, Bear Fist has reduced Fuel Drain and deals Bonus Shock Damage with each hit.

items.name: Tenacious Defense
items.desc: Whenever Moze’s shield is fully depleted, she instantly restores a portion of her shield, and her Gun Damage is increased for a short time.This skill can only trigger after Moze’s shields have fully recharged.

items.flavor: Put a little lead in the air and see what falls over.
items.name: Minigun
items.desc: The Minigun is capable of sustained rapid fire. Firing for long periods causes the Minigun to overheat, rendering it inoperable for a few seconds.

items.flavor: Fasten your seatbelt, it's going to be a bumpy ride.
items.name: Dakka Bear
items.desc: Adds a manned turret to the back of Iron Bear.

items.name: Matched Set
items.desc: Moze's currently equipped weapon gains a stacking bonus to Magazine Size and Decreased Heat Per Shot for every piece of equipped gear that has a matching manufacturer.

items.name: Cloud of Lead
items.desc: Occasionally, Moze's and Iron Bear's shots will deal additional Incendiary Damage and won’t consume ammo.

stats.name: Every $VALUE$ shots does not consume ammo

items.name: Stoke the Embers
items.desc: Increases Moze and Iron Bear’s Incendiary Damage.

items.name: Redistribution
items.desc: After Moze scores a Critical Hit, she regenerates ammo for a few seconds.

items.name: Scrappy
items.desc: While moving, Moze's Handling, Weapon Swap and Mode Switch Speed are increased.

items.name: Let Off Some Steam
items.desc: Minigun deals more damage as heat increases, and can be fired for longer before overheating.

items.flavor: Fire... for effect.
items.name: Salamander
items.desc: The Salamander is a flamethrower that deals Incendiary Damage to enemies at close range. Though the Salamander has infinite ammo, it drains Fuel with use.

items.name: Scorching RPM's
items.desc: Moze gains increased Fire Rate and Critical Hit Damage.

items.flavor: I don't want any messages saying “I'm holding my position.”
items.name: Rushin’ Offensive
items.desc: Moze can sprint and shoot at the same time.

items.name: Fuel Economy
items.desc: Reduces Salamander’s Fuel Drain. Additionally, Iron Bear’s Movement Speed is increased after damaging an enemy with Salamander.

items.name: General Winter
items.desc: Minigun fires Cryo rounds which reduce Heat Gain and Fuel Drain, but deal reduced damage.

items.name: Specialist Bear
items.desc: Equipping two of the same Weapons on Iron Bear increases the damage they deal.

items.name: The Iron Bank
items.desc: Increases Moze's Magazine Size.

items.name: Chemical Warfare
items.desc: Salamander now deals Corrosive Damage. Additionally, Salamander’s Melt Damage is increased.

items.name: Exploding. Bullets.
items.desc: Minigun fires Explosive Rounds that deal increased Splash Damage, but its Fire Rate is decreased.

items.name: “Click, Click...”
items.desc: Moze gains increased Gun Damage as her magazine empties. The less ammo there is remaining, the greater the increase.If Moze has a COV gun equipped, she gains Gun Damage as her gun's heat increases.

items.name: Some for the Road
items.desc: Moze gains infinite ammo for a few seconds after exiting Iron Bear.

stats.name: Some for the Road Duration: $VALUE$ seconds

items.name: Molten Roar
items.desc: The Salamander burst-fires 3 projectiles with increased Fuel Drain, the first of which leaves a large Incendiary area.

items.name: Forge
items.desc: Moze constantly regenerates ammo for her currently equipped weapon.
